website_summaries.verdict: Perfectly formulated to help senior dogs maintain a healthy weight and lean muscles.
pros: Food is manufactured in the United States, meaning it only contains safe and high quality ingredients
Recipe uses natural meats to help the senior dog maintain muscle strength
Includes fatty acids that promote a healthy coat and skin
cons: A little more expensive per pound than other formulas of adult food from Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Solid, affordable dog food
customer_reviews.text: I've been getting food made by Diamond for years. I have two mature beagles (~10 years old) and while they aren't picky about food, you can tell when they like it and when they don't. Our boys will hammer this kibble, so you know they enjoy it, and their digestion, energy levels, coat, and teeth seem to be doing well. I know it can be intimidating choosing a dog food, as it seems that the affordable stuff is of questionable quality while the cost of the "best" foods can make your eyes pop out of your head. But I (and our vet) have been nothing but happy with Diamond's dog food options.
customer_reviews.author: Matt E.

customer_reviews.title: Fungus dog food
customer_reviews.text: If you want to kill your dog feed it this. I didn't figure it out immediately but my house got fungus gnats all of a sudden after buying the first bag. The second bag came with giant clumps of black mold in it, and more fungus gnats. She eats anything like banana peels and peanut shells but she would barely eat this garbage, and also went and ate mud out of my pond instead after I switched her to this food. If all natural means it shows up rotten because it doesn't keep, that isn't good for anything, unless you have a dog that can eat a 35 pound bag of dog food the second it arrives.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for our Frosted Faces
customer_reviews.text: Switched to this brand and flavor when our senior doggies started getting sensitive gums and mouths from age. They've been on it for about 2 years, and while our delivery person doesn't much appreciate the 50lb bag, the puppies sure do! Healthy coats, lean muscle and little to no joint pain. Highly recommend for anyone with senior dogs.
customer_reviews.author: J. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Old dog learns new trick with new food
customer_reviews.text: My 15 y/o dog has been fussy about her food lately. I thought I was buying her a top notched food and did not understand. But yesterday her Diamond Naturals arrived, and suddenly she is again eating without hesitation. I know she likes the particular vegetables they include. I like the included glucosamine chondroitin. And the smell is attractive to her - one sniff and she was ready to eat. I will update the review after a few weeks if there is any other change to note.
customer_reviews.author: D Malbec

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: One evidence of the quality of a dog food: the dog's stools (not a terrific conversation item - but nevertheless....). How large and how firm. A lower quality food with lots of filler is not absorbed well and stools are large. With the Diamond Naturals I am feeding less, higher quality (and better quantity) stools. The dog cleans the bowl and her weight is steady. BUT the most impressive thing is her COAT. Unbelievably shiny - noticeably so after switching to Diamond Naturals (I use a Senior formula for my 7 year old Border Collie). I am very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: jerryb2339

customer_reviews.title: Not easily digestable by some dogs
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this food works for some; however while weaning both of my golden retrievers, we had such a mess on our hands. We followed the instructions to wean them on this food exactly as listed. Our male dog had problems with his bowels after three days, and our female had problems with hers after a week. We wound up under the advice of our vet going back to their previous brand, and their guts healed almost instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Carey

customer_reviews.title: Not good for my dog
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should have read more of the reviews before purchasing. I’m now quite sure it was the food causing my dogs issues. I transitioned the food slowly. She lost her appetite. Then got a UTI. Now she has diarrhea and has been pooping in the house (never an issue). After reading more reviews, I see others had these issues too. I switched her back 2 days ago and her appetite is already returning. Some have had great results, we did not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zeke loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2, two year old dogs as well as an eleven year old and we were feeding them the same food- Diamond Naturals Chicken and Rice for large dogs. The older dog had horrible horrible gas, seriously it was sooo bad. So after a little research I discovered how important it was for older dogs to eat different food due issues ranging from a different set of vitamins needed to the food being easier to digest. He has done really well on this food and no longer has insane gas...now its normal bulldog gas...(not much different but....) Anyway, I highly recommend this brand and line for those with older dogs.
customer_reviews.author: JensaB

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping molten lava zombie farts poops....js.
customer_reviews.text: Gave my 15 yro pit bull violent molten lava poops that smelled zombie farts... In his sleep. Sleeping molten lava zombie farts poops....js.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Both of my dogs started vomiting after eating this
customer_reviews.text: Both my dogs started vomiting after I began mixing this food with their other food in order to transition them over. I wasn't sure what was going on but my vet suggested discontinuing the new food since it was the only factor that had changed. Also, My big dog is basically a garbage disposal and wolfs everything down in a few gulps. After 2 days she wouldn't go near her food and when I investigated the bag it smelled like mold so I tossed it. I don't know if I got a bad bag/batch or what, but I cannot recommend this food based on this experience.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes
customer_reviews.text: My dog didn’t like his other senior food, which is weird. He eats about everything. He’s an overweight lab. He gobbles this up. His coat is really getting better, even just after a few days. He had horrible dandruff and hot spots... everywhere this summer! His hair fell out. He looked pitiful. His hair is growing back in nice and thick. It may be that summer is over, but perhaps it is both. He is also walking a little better, as he has sore hips. To be fair, I also got him a new bed, but still. This seems good!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry D.

customer_reviews.title: Moldy Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: My dog did not like this food, and she eats everything. Half way through the bag I started coming across clumps of food that was black and moldy. I tried to pick the chunks out, but ended up transferring the food to another container. I found this black patch of mold at the bottom of the bag. YUCK! No wonder she did not want to eat this food.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Beware of potential digestion issues
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 13 year old 50 lb spitz mix. I weaned him from his other food as suggested. He started having diarrhea immediately upon starting this food is still having it after 3 weeks. It doesn't seem to agree with him at all and I am going to have to go back to his old food. He hasn't ever had such problems before with switching food. I would highly suggest starting with a smaller bag in case the food doesn't agree with your senior dog.
customer_reviews.author: Biotard

customer_reviews.title: Gave my senior dogs diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was cheaper than the food I usually buy my senior dogs (Royal Canin). I mixed the two foods for awhile but as the proportions became more Diamond and less Royal Canin, my dogs started having diarrhea all over the house. One has had it for almost a week after discontinuing the food. I will be sticking with brands that follow WSAVA guidelines (Royal Canin, Hills/Science Diet, Purina, Iams/Eukanuba). Giving two starts because, well, the dogs did eat it and at $35 the price is good.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Diamond Naturals!!
customer_reviews.text: After getting some blood work done the vet told me my dogs liver enzymes were a bit high. He was 9 or 10 at the time. After switching his food out for this his liver enzymes were back to normal (we got blood work done again 6 months later)Thank you Diamond Naturals! My dog doesn’t seem to love it but if I sprinkle a bit of cheese or add some rice or meat to it he’ll gobble it up.
customer_reviews.author: Golly

customer_reviews.title: Great for your older dog
customer_reviews.text: This is good for your older dog or if you dog has stomach problems .Also if your dog can’t handle rich food or they get gas and diarrhea on other food .My dog does very good on Also it’s not on the List that causes heat disease there over 20 brands that the FDA listed .My vet also told me to give your dog a bit of canned food too .Unless you make your own dog food .This is reduced calorie for older dogs too controls there weight too .
customer_reviews.author: Greg Newhall

customer_reviews.title: She lost 15% in three months (using 50/50 mix).
customer_reviews.text: I waited three months to review this product to see if it showed results. My senior Border collie was overweight and I wanted a quality product which would show results. I found it right here. Feeding it to her 1/3 of the diet, and then 1/2 of her diet has had amazing results. She really loves the taste, has retained her energy level and beautiful coat, and has dropped her weight 15% in three months. I can feel her rib cage, just see her hip bones -- perfect!! I will keep her on maintenance by adjusting the mix with non-"diet" dogfood. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen R

customer_reviews.title: My 2 Old Dogs Love It
customer_reviews.text: I have 1 picky dog and 1 dog that will eat literally anything. The latter isn’t hard to find food for but the other is. The non-picky one also gets gas from some foods but this has been great in helping their mobility and the quality of the ingredients is great. Picking a food that doesn’t have a bunch of fillers and garbage in it is always my goal. Plus it’s made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great ingredients, softest coat at the dog park
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves diamond naturals and I constantly get complements on his coat. We've been using this for years and when we got a puppy recently, he went on the puppy formula without question. I got on this when it was $23 for a 40lb bag after reading reviews on how great the ingredients were but it's jumped up in price significantly. Still less expensive than most
customer_reviews.author: ECUPirate2013

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable Reaction!!
customer_reviews.text: I order from Amazon all the time, so receiving boxes is not an unusual occurrence. However, my dog ran up to me yesterday when I carried in a box containing this bag of food. Wow, she knew what it was before I did...and ate a cup with no wet food mixed in. I think it is a big hit!!! Will try other flavors if this keeps up...she has been a loyal ProPlan eater, and other trials have not worked. And Proplan prices have increased so much, that trying a food that contains glucosamine without crushing tabs into powder and adding , seemed worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great senior dog food
customer_reviews.text: I love the Diamond Naturals brand. My senior Labrador has been eating this for the past several years and loves it. She will be 16 in April. I like to think this food has something to do with that by giving her the nutrition a dog her age requires. And the price is incredibly reasonable for such a high quality food. Couldn't ask for better.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret White

customer_reviews.title: and my vet recommended we switch him to a senior diet to possibly ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog with a borderline thyroid condition, and my vet recommended we switch him to a senior diet to possibly slow down the progression, so he doesn't have to go on medication so soon. So far, he seems to be doing much better. Much more active and happy. Also, he's a notoriously picky eater and enjoys this food a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Monk

customer_reviews.title: Apparently doesn’t taste too good
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old husky doesn’t seem to much like this. Usually he’s very excited when it’s dinner time. With this food he doesn’t seem to card and recently has been skipping it. So unfortunately for us this is a no go. Also my kids thought they ought to try it. My 5 year old describes the taste as dry old dead meat with fur. So I wouldn’t really want to eat it either.
customer_reviews.author: IslandIgloo

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging, poor poop
customer_reviews.text: I have a large kennel and so far have purchased 30 bags of the diamond natural kibble. The first problem is in the shipping. Amazon puts each bag in a separate box but doesn't secure the boxes and about 50% of the boxes arrive opened and about 25% of the bags have arrived with holes in them. As for the quality, I like the ingredient list and the dogs like the taste but the dogs now have twice as much poop and it's soft. I'll be switching back to my previous brand. The dogs had less poop and it was solid and I can get it local so I avoid the Amazon shipping problems.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t use any other brand dog food!
customer_reviews.text: Great dog food! We’ve been using this brand dog food for over 17 years. Our dogs have always been a healthy weight and with no health problems. Their coats are shiny too. Wouldn’t use any other brand!
customer_reviews.author: Cap

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it, vet approves, small enough bite for Scotties
customer_reviews.text: The dogs like it. The vet likes it. The price is okay. The vet says this is one of the best dog foods on the market today, much better than many more expensive brands. And, as I said ... the dogs really like it and that is getting harder as they get older and pickier!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn ArmstrongTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: Before this Lucy was on Blue Buffalo Sr. but this was similar and had more joint meds. She loves it. Lets us know when it's dinner time and finishes every bite. It's also a little less expensive which really helps.
customer_reviews.author: Mikele R. Meether

customer_reviews.title: My 9 and 11 year old pups love it!
customer_reviews.text: As the title states, my pups love the senior food. I recently switched after my two bullies were on Diamond Naturals Chicken/Beef/Lamb since they were little. I did notice a bit more pep in their steps and my girl(who for the past couple years has has sore hips) seems to be more active. Will continue to keep them on the senior food. Amazon delivery makes getting their food very convenient!
customer_reviews.author: The Duke

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my senior dogs but
customer_reviews.text: It is too harsh for one of my dogs as I just noticed she developed colitis. I have a 9 year old male and a 7 year old female. Both are large dogs and the price was good. The ingredients are decent. My dogs did not like the flavor so I have to supplement it with carrots and mozzarella. I will just have to spend more to find something that does not hurt her stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Flavor? I guess it’s a 5 star; dogs seem to like it but I’m not trying it. We were looking for a dog food that didn’t have all the extra crud so many companies use as filler. Diamond Naturals fits the bill! My dogs love it and the vet is happy with their weight. A good price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: IA Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Price just went up to $46
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE : price came back down to $36 . I will buy again , but it will not be a once a month subscribed delievery. we were happy with the food for our 9 year old boy. and at $36 it was comparable with what we were buying local, but with the price increase to $46 and having bought 12 previous bags at $36, this will be the last one !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a rock and apparently not tasty
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is hard as a rock. My dog refused to eat it until she was desperate and it sounded like someone eating a bowl of grape nuts. Bought a new type and mixed this in using a 75% other to 25% this ratio- and she does her best to eat around this stuff. May be great for some, but not my poor pooch.
customer_reviews.author: Boscannon

customer_reviews.title: Wow this is a great product!
customer_reviews.text: I cant believe i found a "senior"dog food that works exceptionally well! It has senior nutrition with not a lot of fat (which allows dogs to be a healthy weight) and specific combination of foods that are for sensitive skin and stomach. I have purchased many other brands and nothing was good enough especially since "senior" dog food for sensitive skin and stomach" doesn't really exist! My dog is a 6 year old Boxer mix and she love's her food! Maria
customer_reviews.author: Danny Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Clean Feed
customer_reviews.text: After researching a number of articles from reputable sources, this one stood out. The ingredients and method of manufacture are impressive and my pups love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Knows - Usually :-)

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This dog food gives allergies, my dog was never ill before he could eat everything I buy this diamond natural dog food be amazon! The first order and the first food package was excellent after the second food back, my dog received diarrhea and skin allergies, I gives the food to a friend and my friend dog received the same health issues so we find the source of the improvised long term illness this food made my dog sick now my dog and my friend dog are allergic to everything. The dogs can not eat chicken he can not eat meat he can not eat carrots and potatoes anymore :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A five bark review
customer_reviews.text: Both of my dogs absolutely love this food! They like it so much that I have replaced their dog snacks with a few pieces of this dry food. Whenever I give them any, they act like I am giving them the best little treats, ever. When our dogs are happy, we are happy too. From now on, I will only feed them this food. Period.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Kearney

customer_reviews.title: Amazing company
customer_reviews.text: After buying the Diamond Naturals. I changed to the large bags of Diamond (no Naturals) Its well balanced great food at a great price... My vet says for his patients to NOT by (grain free any brand) I found Diamond and love it...Small US company in WI
customer_reviews.author: N Hyde

customer_reviews.title: Dogs wouldn't eat it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs typically love Diamond food but this one was a dud. I'm guessing the flavor profile for senior dogs must be pretty bland. It did take my dogs twice as long to eat, so I saved a little money.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: First of all whoever decided to put dog food on Amazon Prime is awesome! Having this show up at your door step instead of lugging it around the grocery store is AWESOME! I did the math on this and I can have this delivered to my door step for the same price I was buying it at a big box store. Also I have a dog that is super sensitive to his food and he is doing better in this food than any other we have tried. He is a little bit older and he likes the smaller bites. This is a great dog food. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: It contains Glucosamine and Chondroitin an essential ingredient for senior dogs !
customer_reviews.text: I was using the Diamond Naturals 'chicken & rice' formula. It is great stuff. I would be still using it, except that my dog is now over eight years old. I was attracted to "Dry Food for Seniors" because it contains Glucosamine and Chondroitin. This is, in my opinion, an essential ingredient for senior dogs.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: My dogs excited to eat
customer_reviews.text: My dog seriously loves this food! I’ve never in his 6 yrs of life seen him be so excited to eat! Makes me so happy that we finally found something he enjoys. I also love the size of the food, reminds me of larger Cheerios. But seriously he looks and I’m sure feels so much better in his joints cause he moves so much better, if you can afford this and are looking for a great senior dog food try this!
customer_reviews.author: Alyissa

customer_reviews.title: Easily digested. Great price for awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: I run an animal rescue, and this is the food I feed my personal pets. I have giant breeds with grain issues. This is the highest quality for the cheapest price and my dogs love it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: its affordable for my sensitive dog
customer_reviews.text: My Heeler is 12yrs old and has been on Dimond brand a few years no issues.. when she was younger she used to tear her fur out big patches on her back sides.. once i got her on Diamond it stopped.. its not the best food you can buy. its not the worst buy a long shot.. shes now 12years old and likes her food. she still has a spring in her step she is pretty content with her food unless my little ones feed her from their plates.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: My old guy has a pretty sensitive tummy. Sensitive skin too. This food has helped him put some weight back on and he seems to really like it. It doesn't upset his stomach and the Ingredients give me confidence that he's getting the nutrition that his old body needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Blumenthal

customer_reviews.title: Not good for some senior dogs
customer_reviews.text: I decided to switch from blue senior since this one is all natural too. But my 15 year old dachshund, who eats balloons with no problem, kept throwing up every single night after switching. And my other dog had diarrhea or loose stool every day from it As soon as I switched back to blue, problem solved! Not sure what they put in the food, but makes me question the ingredients since my dogs never had this issue with any other brand...
customer_reviews.author: dfr

customer_reviews.title: Edit energy to my animals
customer_reviews.text: I have two American bulldogs 75 and 65 pounds male and female I have noticed a difference in them and I’m on my second bag they absolutely love it they have all the energy in the world they are four years old now and act like puppies
customer_reviews.author: dorothy brown karnowski

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t a good product for nyc
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 small shih tzus.. I slowly introduced to their diet, immediately it gave them diarrhea. I stayed with it 2 weeks thinking the diarrhea would stop. I finally discarded it, went with another brand and immediately the diarrhea stopped too.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Dog Food for the money.
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a 10 yr old rat terrier that just tears up this brand of food he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: jacpotscot1

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old chihuahua will eat ANYTHING and he hated this food. He starved himself for a whole two days because he didnt want to eat this . Smells like hay and its really dusty
customer_reviews.author: BBAARBBZZ

customer_reviews.title: Web Page Ingredients Don't Match Bag
customer_reviews.text: Product info on the web page in one place lists chicken & chicken meal as the 1st two ingredients but in another area brown rice is listed as the 1st ingredient. I didn't realize that brown rice was 1st until the bag was delivered. I would not have purchased it if I had known this. They should be more careful when putting ingredient information on the web site.
customer_reviews.author: ASLC

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I would not have believed it if I didn't buy it for my senior beagle, but it has made her digestive system so much better... no more soft stool.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my best friend happy and healthy
customer_reviews.text: My senior dog eats this after my vet recommended a food change to address some skin irritations. He likes this, has really efficient poops, and no more itchy skin.
customer_reviews.author: McJules

customer_reviews.title: Good once before. Not so much the second time.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying this. And it seems my Seinor dog has gained weight when I wanted her to lose weight. Maybe she’s just too old. I don’t know. I think the food is good cause the first time she did lose weight. I just think she’s older now and having a harder time losing weight.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: The only brand I'll feed my little doggie.
customer_reviews.text: Had to put my little pugzu Wimbley on a diet and she's been on Diamond Naturals since she was eight weeks old. So this was the natural choice. Wimbley likes it... Though she'd rather have steak or chicken! 😉
customer_reviews.author: Brain_Sick_Monkey

customer_reviews.title: My ten-year-old boxer mix was starting to struggle from stiffness ...
customer_reviews.text: My ten-year-old boxer mix was starting to struggle from stiffness when getting up from a laying position. I have fed him "Taste of the Wild" dog food for most of his life but that doesn't have glucosamine so I switched. Not only am I spending less in dog food now but he loves it and it is definitely helping with the stiffness.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Williams

customer_reviews.title: Doggy Approved
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this brand of dog food for my senior dog's for quite a while and they both absolutely love it. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a healthy dog food at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: AngelicasBookHaven

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: My dog was a little bent out of shape when I purchased this food because I had been feeding her cooked chicken and rice. I didn't feel that she was thriving on that diet so I wanted to find a food with wholesome ingredients that didn't break my budget. As with any properly spoiled dog, she doesn't go to the food dish until she's absolutely certain she's not getting anything else. But she eats it like she likes it. It's just not fresh chicken and rice. The neighbors dog who is here regularly cleans up any food remaining every time she's here.
customer_reviews.author: Skeptic

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work with my Golden
customer_reviews.text: I gradually mixed Diamond Naturals with her old food from Kirkland because I thought maybe at 10 yrs old, she should start a Senior food. The results, unfortunately, were not solid stools. That's putting it mildly. Gave the trial a month and now she is back on her old food, Nature's Domain, which I found out is actually made by the same company. Maybe Diamond Senior was too "rich" for her system. She's fine now after a week on the old brand.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Dogs like it, vet likes it.
customer_reviews.text: The dogs like it and they have stopped producing quite the volume of gas they were creating with the regular adult version. Small crunchy bits are good for both small AND big dogs. The vet also approves. A win all around.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn ArmstrongTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great for my picky eater
customer_reviews.text: One of my dogs is extremely picky with food. Won’t eat most things and we have tried a lot of things including making our own dog food but she is picky about that stuff too. We tried this after having some luck with the regular adult food of this brand and she loves it. She eats with no issues and it’s affordable.
customer_reviews.author: PAW

customer_reviews.title: ... to a lot of foods this one he does great on. Transiting to a new food always was ...
customer_reviews.text: With my old (13 years old) Beagle developing issues to a lot of foods this one he does great on. Transiting to a new food always was an issue with him no matter how slow I made the change. However, not with this one. I think I could of avoided some food changes had I put him on senior food a few years back. I do highly recommend this. The best part of all he loves this food. I just wish I could but this locally.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: My dogs lost their appitites with this food.  See if your dog likes it.
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs about 10 years old. One small and one medium. Both of their appetites dropped off so far with this product that they would skip 1-2 meals at a time before they would eat again. When I went pack to their regular food, the appetites came back. Yes, I took the time to integrate the new food, I even tried to add meat juices to get them to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M

customer_reviews.title: Fuzzy green moldy kibble
customer_reviews.text: Bought two bags. 1st bag had a large amount of moldy kibble. 2nd bag had way less mold but still. Wont buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Activeconsumer

customer_reviews.title: My big dogs do well on this food
customer_reviews.text: My senior dogs love this food snd seem to do very well on it. They're both large dogs and one tends to easily get overweight on a lot of the foods that we've tried, but she hasn't seemed to gain as much weight on this one.
customer_reviews.author: jules65

customer_reviews.title: Upset my 13yo labs stomach
customer_reviews.text: Sadly upset my 13 yo labs dogs stomach and gave him diarrhea. He was sick for days.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Diamond Naturals Dry Food For Senior Dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are loving this mixture. I usually get them the beef but decided to get the senior formula for the extra ingredients to help with their age related needs. I will not have to supplement them with extra antioxidants, omega oils or glucosamine chondroitin. This product has not upset their tummies either.
customer_reviews.author: CoCo's Mom

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good dog food for a senior dog. I have 10 years old dog, this dog food seems to have all the ingredients that’s good for my dog. She ate it right up, she loves the smell and the crunchiness of it. The price is reasonable compared to the other on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Kaew

customer_reviews.title: Not so good dogfood
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs (same age, sisters) and this dog food gave one of them really bad diarrhea. The other one seems to do ok with it, but I will not be buying it again. The first ingredient is brown rice. I always think the first ingredient should be protein.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi

customer_reviews.title: Makes my dog sick
customer_reviews.text: Made my lab retriever sick after just two days of this food. She is still having diarrhea and throwing up even though she's been off it for two days.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Dog Food Around and a Real Bargain!!
customer_reviews.text: we have been buying Diamond Dog Food for our 14 Year Old Boxer. He needs senior food but hasn't liked the taste of some foods. He loves this food and his coat is so shiny and healthy even for an old guy!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Highly rated
customer_reviews.text: I guess it tastes good because none of my dogs ever disliked Diamond naturals. Great ingredients for lowish cost. Highly rated by dog food advisor
customer_reviews.author: Irish3

customer_reviews.title: ... food has helped my senior dogs move around more easily. They both love it and the shape of ...
customer_reviews.text: The added glucosamine in this food has helped my senior dogs move around more easily. They both love it and the shape of the pieces (like Cheerios) make them have to crunch it (o's get hooked on teeth). So, the food has dental benefits, as well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: T. A. Lynch-Bobbitt

customer_reviews.title: Affordable senior dog food with quality
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to change my 9 year old dog to a senior food tha was budget friendly with great quality and diamond natural fit the bill. The transition was effortless . I do think his coat is looking better. He consumes his food all day long never has been one to eat ate one sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helped inching 7 year old Lab
customer_reviews.text: One of our Labradors, 7 year old has developed a really bad inching problem in the past year. Have tried several different foods. It took about 4 weeks and inching reduced. Now at almost 2 months it has stopped. Can really feel the difference in his coat. Started at head and neck and has continued to his whole body.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S

customer_reviews.title: Makes a healthy difference
customer_reviews.text: Saw a difference in walking in just a few days. No limping. Seems to like it. After 2 days on another brand started limpinv again. Makes a healthy difference.
customer_reviews.author: Ashanti

customer_reviews.title: Dog and owner love it.
customer_reviews.text: Glad we found this. We switched after our Iams kind was discontinued. My dog seems to really like this food. We really like it because (Sorry to y’all about poop) my dogs poop hasn’t been runny once since switching. It’s nice that it has the joint supplements in with the food so I don’t need to keep buying the vitamins separately. We will definitely reorder.
customer_reviews.author: MTal

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Great brand!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great brand and the Amazon price cannot be beaten by anyone. My dog has been eating this brand for years. Great quality and amazing price!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S. Pegram

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Like It
customer_reviews.text: My dogs really like Diamond Senior and it is rated 4 stars for quality. They are not having any digestive issues with it. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My 5 dogs have been doing great since we switched to Diamond Naturals. No tummy troubles at all. A+
customer_reviews.author: nytrip911

customer_reviews.title: Boxers love this food
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love this food. We have 2 older boxers (10 and 12) and it helps keep good weight on them and they are pretty lazy dogs. It was like $1.00 more to have this primed to us rather than buying in the store and it arrived safely with no holes.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Proffet

customer_reviews.title: High-quality food at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Great, high-quality dog food. My dogs love it. Reasonable price for a high-quality food. I had researched dog foods for highest quality (on dogfood advisor) and Diamond was a 4.5 star. I am very picky about what I'll feed my "kids" and this makes us all happy.
customer_reviews.author: Irene's mom

customer_reviews.title: My 11 year old girl likes it
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of different foods for my 11 year old girl, and she seems to like this best. Her teeth are not good at all, so while this food isn't very soft, she has no trouble eating it. It doesn't seem to give her coat the gloss she gets with salmon foods, but she definitely likes it better, so it's a 5 star in my book:).
customer_reviews.author: Old AliceTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my little lady!
customer_reviews.text: I slowly switched my dog over to this food since she’s over 8 now, and her coat has gotten sooooo soft in the past few months and her joints are doing better. Less limping after she plays hard.
customer_reviews.author: Darian

customer_reviews.title: Finally found good dog food
customer_reviews.text: Fair priced meal for my aging boy who has hella allergies. Thank you and please keep the same ingredients!
customer_reviews.author: H Freeman

customer_reviews.title: This dog food was recommended by my vet years ago and we made the ...
customer_reviews.text: This dog food was recommended by my vet years ago and we made the mistake of not getting it only once for my three...that's right, I said it...three rescue basset hounds. All of them are over ten years old and are as spry as ever. One of them has a lot of trouble digesting other dog foods, and this is the only dog food he has had no trouble with. I highly recommend this and all other Diamond dog foods for your fur babies.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Dog
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a long time now. My dog is 15 and in great health. So that makes me happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good size & palatable
customer_reviews.text: No idea of it helps yet, but I'm encouraged that my senior dog was able to eat it so much quicker than his usual food. The size of the food is comparable to cat food, and he devoured it. Hopefully, this helps him overall. Will update after more time.
customer_reviews.author: Vagirlnga

customer_reviews.title: Product damaged upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: The bag was busted when it arrived. They wouldn’t credit me or send a new bag. My dogs won’t even touch it. It’s advertised as containing omega 3’s but it’s plant based omegas. Not wild caught fish, which is what I searched when this popped up. #readthelabel
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product great / delivery not so much
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food. No problem with that. But when it was delivered, the bag had been ripped open ( I assume from the shoe box that was shipped with it) and there was lots of loose kibble in the box. So I have a large bag of dog food, with about a 10 inch rip in the side. Product gets great rating / shipping gets a POOR rating.
customer_reviews.author: C. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Been great for the pooch so far.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my bichon who is about 10 years old. She is on the smaller size and I was nervous about the size of the kibbles, but she doesn't seem to have any issues with it. I decided to switch to this because of the benefits for the more senior dogs. I will be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: Ga Wei

customer_reviews.title: My CATS love it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my senior dog, he does not care for it at all. My two one year old cats however beg for it.
customer_reviews.author: WildLoonyBird

customer_reviews.title: Good for my dogs joints and stomach
customer_reviews.text: the best food for older dogs I have found. It has joint medicine in it and oatmeal for sensitive stomachs, my dog does well on it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kuhlman

customer_reviews.title: Dogs liked it!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs liked it well enough until I noticed there was egg in it. One of my dogs is allergic to egg, so had to find another dog food instead.
customer_reviews.author: Rosebud

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: Diamond Naturals is a great brand. I started using it years ago. I switched from Pedigree and within a month my dogs’ coats were healthier and shinier. My older dogs were more active and happy :)
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Trumbly

customer_reviews.title: Great for older dogs
customer_reviews.text: My older dogs love it! Easy to soak & quality food. They have maintained a good body weight, where they had lost weight on other foods.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. She maintains a good weight on it and seems happy and healthy. Definitely happy with this food.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla Emmitt

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.text: My Boston Terrier developed an Omega 3 fatty acid deficiency when I was feeding him this food. Hair loss, crusty patches on his skin. My vet knew right away that it was from this food! I’m throwing it away and have started a new food.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Pricing
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food. It is really good quality. However, the price keeps changing on Amazon. I will continue to purchase from other sources that are more cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nelson

customer_reviews.title: My dogs have more energy
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a number of different grain free dog foods for my four dogs. My dogs ages range from 6 to 12. I can tell they all have more energy and love to play once again. It's difficult to find one food that four different breeds will respond to. However, at this point, Diamond senior dog food fits their needs and is perfect for my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: No problems for my old dogs
customer_reviews.text: I've had my dogs on this for about a year (started when they were 8, they just turned 9) and it seems great. Great ingredients and I like that it has probiotics. No poop or skin issues. I will keep them on this!
customer_reviews.author: B. Nichols

product_meta.title: Diamond Naturals Dry Senior Dog Food Formula Made with Chicken, Egg and Oatmeal with Protein, Probiotics, Superfoods, Antioxidants to Support Overall Health and Wellness in Older Dogs
product_meta.description:
Size:35 lb

Made with ingredients of exceptional quality, Diamond Naturals provides complete, holistic nutrition for every pet. Each Diamond Naturals dry formula is enhanced with superfoods and guaranteed probiotics, for optimal nutrition and digestive support. Diamond Naturals Senior Dog Chicken, Egg and Oatmeal Formula is formulated to meet the needs of your aging friend. Optimal protein and fat levels help your senior dog maintain ideal body condition, while added glucosamine and chondroitin support joints. Probiotics and added fiber help support digestion even in sensitive pets.

Ingredients

Whole grain brown rice, chicken, chicken meal, peas, egg, oatmeal, rice bran, dried beet pulp, chicken fat (preserved with mixed tocopherols), natural flavor, flaxseed, potassium chloride, choline chloride, glucosamine hydrochloride, dried chicory root, L-Carnitine, kale, chia seed, pumpkin, blueberries, oranges, quinoa, dried kelp, coconut, spinach, carrots, papaya, yucca schidigera extract, dried Lactobacillus plantarum fermentation product, dried Bacillus subtilis fermentation product, dried Lactobacillus acidophilus fermentation product, dried Enterococcus faecium fermentation product, dried Bifidobacterium animalis fermentation product, vitamin E supplement, beta carotene, chondroitin sulfate, iron proteinate, zinc proteinate, copper proteinate, ferrous sulfate, zinc sulfate, copper sulfate, potassium iodide, thiamine mononitrate (vitamin B1), manganese proteinate, manganous oxide, ascorbic acid, vitamin A supplement, biotin, niacin, calcium pantothenate, manganese sulfate, sodium selenite, pyridoxine hydrochloride (vitamin B6), vitamin B12 supplement, riboflavin (vitamin B2), vitamin D supplement, folic acid.

Contains a source of live (viable), naturally occurring microorganisms.

Guaranteed Analysis

Crude Protein 25.0% Minimum
Crude Fat 11.0% Minimum
Crude Fiber 4.0% Maximum
Moisture 10.0% Maximum
Calcium 1.1% Minimum
Phosphorus 0.8% Minimum
Zinc 150 mg/kg Minimum
Selenium 0.35 mg/kg Minimum
Vitamin A 15,000 mg/kg Minimum
Vitamin E 150 IU/kg Minimum
L-Carnitine* 500 mg/kg Minimum
Omega-6 Fatty Acids* 2.2% Minimum
Omega-3 Fatty Acids* 0.3% Minimum
Glucosamine* 720 mg/kg Minimum
Chondroitin Sulfate* 240 mg/kg Minimum
Total Microorganisms* Not Less Than 80,000,000 CFU/lb
(Lactobacillus plantarum, Bacillus subtilis, Lactobacillus acidophilus, Enterococcus faecium, Bifidobacterium animalis)

Calorie Content

3,400 kcal/kg (318 kcal/cup) Calculated Metabolizable Energy
feature_bullets: High quality protein made with real CAGE FREE chicken, to maintain ideal body condition for senior dog; added Glucosamine & Chondroitin for joints
A natural food with added vitamins & minerals; fruits, vegetables & SUPERFOODS for natural ANTIOXIDANTS; fatty acid blend for SKIN & coat for seniors
Nutrient rich and HIGHLY digestible with PROPRIETARY, senior species specific probiotics that survive and thrive in the GI tract; at levels
Family owned & run, MADE in the USA choosing ingredients from TRUSTED, SUSTAINABLE sources around the world; Call with questions 800 442 0402
No corn, wheat, filler; NO ARTIFICIAL flavors, colors, or preservatives added; lid diet for seniors; made with scientifically advanced food safety protocols. No soy

specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
